data.title: Short Stories
data.meta_description: Individual Stories Abdication Street (with Eugene Byrne) (1996): Interzone, Back in the USSA (Ziesing). The Adventure of the Six Maledictions (2011) **: Gaslight Arcanum: Uncanny Tales of Sherlock Holmes. Amerikanski Dead at the Moscow Morgue (1999): 999 The Last Horror Anthology, New Stories of Horror And Suspense, Unforgivable Stories (Pocket Books), The Mammoth Book of New Terror…
data.text:
Individual Stories

* This short story subsequently was expanded into Anno Dracula

+ These novellas/stories were incorporated into Johnny Alucard.

** These novellas/stories were incorporated into Professor Moriarty: The Hound of the d’Urbervilles.

*** This chapter was deleted from early editions of The Bloody Red Baron but has been restored in the Titan edition.

++ These novellas/stories were incorporated into Angels of Music.

+++ This novella was expanded into the novel of the same name.

# This novella subsequently was expanded into The Secrets of Drearcliff Grange School.

## This short story was rewritten as the opening of Anno Dracula One Thousand Monsters.
